defect_complex_name.description: The name of the defect complex, indicating the types of defects present.

supercell_structure_formula.description: The chemical formula of the supercell structure after introducing the defect complex.

defect_complex_oxidation_state.description: Checks if the total oxidation state of the defect complex is equal to the number calculated as the sum of the oxidation states of substitution defect and vacancy defect.

element_changes.description: The net change in the number of each element due to the defect complex.

defect_structure_formula.description: The chemical formula of the defect structure itself, without considering the supercell.

defect_complex_with_interstitial_name.description: The name of the defect complex including an interstitial defect.

supercell_structure_with_dummy_formula.description: The chemical formula of the supercell structure with a dummy species added to account for the interstitial defect.

defect_complex_equality.description: Checks if two defect complexes are identical.

defect_complex_inequality.description: Checks if two defect complexes are different.
